Maximum logo height is 100px. All uploaded files will be resized to fit within the constraint. The "Logo Height" field is required for the checkout process and for retina devices. Enter the height of your regular logo.

Retina logos are displayed on devices with a higher than normal pixel density. Using this option ensures that your logo looks great on all devices (e.g., iPad with retina display). Retina logos must be uploaded at exactly double the dimensions of a regular logo. For example, a regular logo at 180x100 would be 360x200 in retina.
Background image width and height are required for retina images to display correctly. Simply enter the height and width values in pixels, "100" for example.
